title: Unconventional Monetary Policy and Central Bank Communications
content: Figure 2: The Conditionality of Forward Guidance  and the Evolution of Federal Funds Rate Expectations                 April to November 2010                     November 2010 to February 2011  Percent                                                                                   Percent                 Note:  This figure depicts financial market expectations for the federal funds rate at forecast horizons from 0 to 12 quarters ahead;  these expectations are computed by staff using price quotes from CME Group on federal funds and Eurodollar futures contracts.    The left panel depicts expectations as of April 1, 2010 (solid line), August 2, 2010 (long dashed line), and November 3, 2010 (short  dashed line).  The right panel depicts expectations as of November 3, 2010 (dashed line) and February 22, 2011 (solid line).   0.0  0.5  1.0  1.5  2.0  2.5  I II III IV I II III IV I II III IV 2010 2011 2012  April 1, 2010 August 2, 2010 November 3, 2010  0.0  0.5  1.0  1.5  2.0  2.5  I II III IV I II III IV I II III IV 2011 2012 2013  November 3, 2010 February 22, 2011
